column4: hey dudes got a prob ,.,. i get this error message -- tar: firefox-3.0b2.tar.bz2: Cannot open: No such file or directory
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
tar: Error exit delayed from previous errors
-- when typing this command -- sudo tar -C /opt -jxvf firefox-3.0b2.tar.bz2
yep this is the line as it looks on my terminal -- bod@bod-desktop:~$ <bod_>
or you could try tar xzvf ~/Desktop/firefox-3.0b2.tar.bz2
cheers dude that was the prob
